titles.title: A concurrent resolution to make a change in the enrollment of the bill H.R. 4174.

vote.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment by Voice Vote.

action.text: Message on Senate action sent to the House.
Called up by House Under Suspension of Rules.
Resolution Agreed to in House by Voice Vote.

bill.summary: 10/14/1988--Introduced. Changes the enrollment of H.R. 4174, (Small Business Administration Reauthorization and Amendment Act of 1988), deleting provisions that render small businesses doing business with South Africa ineligible for certain programs and activities.
